ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (ISPICKVAL(Pay_Account_Type__c, "StarTrack Account"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Credit_Management_Request",
ISPICKVAL(Credit_Work_Type__c, "Change of Billing Account Details"),
ISPICKVAL(Billing_Account_Change_of_Details_Type__c, "Contact Information"),
OR (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Account_Change_of_Details_Sub_Ty__c,"New Phone Number")),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Account_Change_of_Details_Sub_Ty__c, "New Email Address"))))
